title: Stunning hotel with superb staff and comfortable rooms!
text: We finished off a tour of California here and loved this hotel! Superb staff from the doorment to the concierge, and the front desk to the restaurant. They couldn't do enough to help us.Loved the decor, even though anchors aren't usually my thing. Very children friendly without losing any of the adult friendliness. Really gorgeous, comfy, stylish and sociable lobby area to enjoy an hour or so by the fire.We wouldn't hestitate to come back here anytime.
